title: NERF katarina and yasuo
body: I feel that katarina and yasuo are completly unfun and unfair to play against. DELETE THEM

replies.body: Lol Kat is garbage. Only people who play her are 1 tricks. She is easy to outplay.
You can outplay Katarina. You can't outplay Yasuo lol. Just buy MR vs Kat, and you're fine. But you can't buy armor against Yasuo and win. He does too much armor pen damage.

yasuo?
yes. as of currently he is actually busted and is slated for nerfs next patch.

katarina?
51% win rate and a 5% pick rate. that's actually balanced believe it or not. she is also highly predictable and can't actually kill you so long as you don't position like a bonobo or take too many burst trades.
Say that to gunblade that fixes all her problems. Not complaining about her just the item.

> [{quoted}](name=Corrector1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KjZppmPI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-02-17T04:08:36.166+0000)
>
> Say that to gunblade that fixes all her problems. Not complaining about her just the item.

although this is true that's more riots fault tbh. they for some reason make items that can flat out remove some weaknesses of a champion.

example:
{{champion:67}} {{champion:51}} terrible waveclear, so not good at a brute force siege.  
{{item:3087}} {{item:3094}} boom now you can take towers like any other champion

{{champion:238}} {{champion:133}} not good into CC because of fear for safety or going in a 1 for 1 
{{item:3814}} boom free spellshield (plus lethality)

{{champion:21}} {{champion:498}} {{champion:45}}  super squishy afraid of being dived on to 
{{item:3026}} boom now you get a little revive or {{item:3157}} burst negation

{{champion:114}} {{champion:240}} weak to being poked out of lane 
{{item:1059}} boom now you sustain by PvE minions.
Yep basically explained well. Well xayah has a fizz E ult but can root enemies after so theres that to stop attackers at least she isnt dependant as hard on item effects.
Katarina is complete dogshit. Yas is too op tho
